title: Land for sale in Rajagiriya
details:
* 11 Perches rectangular land for sale, 20 feet access road, highly residential area.

* 3 Km to rajagiriya, 900 meters to battaramulla koswatta, 700 meters to angoda, 1.5 km to highway entrance.

* 12.8 million for total land, with a bank loan, selling for highest offer, no brokers.
